scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter to Professor Theodore Spencer of Cambridge, Massachusetts, E.E. Cummings of New York thanks him for his new book, writing about his wife and one of his poems, "Marian [has] been in a hospital since March 23rd wrestling with pleurisy and bursitis; Out doctor says she may stay another two weeks. Now I find her courage is as great as her beauty...Perhaps you can imagine how I value your good opinion of '1X1'."
